title: Tiktok API - EnsembleData · Apify
name: Tiktok API - EnsembleData
description: EnsembleData's powerful TikTok scraper tool, providing you with efficient, reliable and cost-optimised results.
readme_summary: EnsembleData's powerful TikTok scraper tool, providing you with efficient, reliable and cost-optimised results. This Apify Actor allows users to effortlessly extract data from the Tiktok platform, including post info & stats, author metadata, video metadata, audio metadata, and post comments. The actor is currently offered for free, with minimal platform costs. The input parameter is a list of Tiktok post URLs to scrape. The example input and output demonstrate how to use the actor to scrape post info and post comments.
